description: Makes a simple HTTP request to a provided URL using curl. This is beneficial when monitoring for 500/404/403/etc responses.

paramSchema.title: URLs
paramSchema.name: URL
paramSchema.description: The URL to check, must include http:// or https://

paramSchema.title: Username
paramSchema.name: username
paramSchema.description: (optional) If the endpoint is password protected, what username should graphdat use when calling it.

paramSchema.title: Password
